posts.post_content: Replaced by [Knight Errant](/Pages/Card/Details.aspx?name=Knight Errant) or better yet [Glory Seeker](/Pages/Card/Details.aspx?name=Glory Seeker) for soldier tribal. Back in the '90s this card was relatively 'better' in that every other color but green had to pay 3 mana for a 2/2 ability-less common creature, thus it was in itself on par with [Scathe Zombies](/Pages/Card/Details.aspx?name=Scathe Zombies) etc. not so much vs. [Grizzly Bears](/Pages/Card/Details.aspx?name=Grizzly Bears)
posts.html:

*indispensable* for white weeny ;)

And she begrudgeingly plays magic with me.
